name: Sudoku Dragon Gems
description:
Sudoku Dragon Gems Vol.I - The classic mind game of Sudoku that features many numeric puzzles of increasing difficulty.

Try to complete many numeric Sudoku puzzles that span easy, normal, medium and hard levels that are a match for beginners and seasoned players alike.

Can you become a Sudoku Dragon Gems Master?... Only the best will succeed.

Good luck!

Features:

* Classic Sudoku gameplay.
* Increasingly harder Sudoku puzzles.
* Easy, Normal, Medium and Hard levels as you progress.
* Can make gem digit notes.
* Compete against the clock
* Resume game feature.
* Easy to pick up and play.
* Suitable for all ages.
* Superb themed graphics and sound.
* Achievements system.
